title: BREAKING! Astronomers Discover Two Closest Black Holes to Earth
summary: Astronomers have made an exciting discovery using data from the European Space Agency’s Gaia mission. They have found not one, but two black holes that are the closest to Earth ever discovered.

title: Investing in Space: Boeing’s got to get going
summary: “Boeing pushed back the flight schedule of its Starliner capsule by several months, the company said on a conference call with reporters Wednesday.”

title: Chinese defense contractor to begin launching VLEO satellites
summary: A major Chinese state-owned defense contractor is preparing to launch the first satellite for a very low Earth orbit constellation.

title: SpaceX aborts launch with initial satellites for Space Development Agency
summary: SpaceX is now scheduled to launch a batch of 10 communications and missile tracking satellites on the Tranche 0 Flight 1 mission for the Space Development Agency (SDA) on Friday, March 31, 2023, at approximately 7:29 AM PDT (14:29 UTC). A first attempt on Thursday was aborted at T-3 seconds.

title: NASA releases draft strategy for long-term robotic Mars exploration
summary: NASA has unveiled a draft strategy for long-term robotic exploration of Mars that emphasizes low-cost missions and potential commercial partnerships.
